== Chennithala (CT) (628288) ==

Chennithala (CT) is a town in the [[Mavelikkara]] taluka of [[Alappuzha]] district with an area of 6.38 sq. km. and harbouring 3345 households with total population of 12360 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Alappuzha]] is at a distance of 48 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 126 km. Male population is 5719 and female population is 6641. Scheduled Caste population is 982 and Scheduled Tribes population is 11. Census Location Code of the town is 628288<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Alappuzha (m + og) at a distance of 48 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 92 km. Railway station is at Mavelikkara at a distance of 4 km.
